mapper.select: /* admin.mrr.selectMrrMgt */ SELECT A.MRR_SEQ ,A.SJ ,A.CN ,A.STTUS ,A.RGST_NO ,A.DEPT ,PARTCPTN_CNT ,DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.RSDVE_DT, '%Y%m%d'), '%Y.%m.%d') AS RSDVE_DT ,DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.START_T, '%H%i'), '%H:%i') AS START_T ,DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.END_T, '%H%i'), '%H:%i') AS END_T ,CASE A.DELETE_YN WHEN 'Y' THEN '예' ELSE '아니오' END DELETE_YN_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(A.RGST_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') AS RGST_DT FROM TB_MRR A WHERE A.MRR_SEQ = #{mrr_seq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete:
/* admin.mrr.deleteMrrMgt */
DELETE FROM TB_MRR WHERE MRR_SEQ = #{mrr_seq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: /* admin.mrr.selectListMrrCldr */ SELECT CAST(A.MRR_SEQ as CHAR) AS id ,A.SJ AS title ,CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.RSDVE_DT, '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d'),'T',DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.START_T, '%H%i'), '%H:%i')) AS start ,CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.RSDVE_DT, '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d'),'T',DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.END_T, '%H%i'), '%H:%i')) AS end FROM TB_MRR A
